SELECT i.interaction_id as id, i.interaction_id as commentId, i.user_id as userId, u.username as author, u.avatar as avatar, i.comment_content as content, i.parent_id as parentId, i.comment_like_count as likeCount, i.create_time as createTime FROM interaction i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.user_id = u.user_id WHERE i.post_id = #{postId} AND i.interaction_type = 'comment' AND i.status = 1 AND (i.comment_status = '正常' OR i.comment_status IS NULL) ORDER BY i.create_time ASC
